spasection.title: Your wellness refuge in the heart of

amenities.texttwo: Our certified therapists customize each session to relieve tension and restore balance to your body.
amenities.textfour: Enjoy all our premium facilities without having to stay overnight. Perfect for a day of relaxation and well-being.

questions.question: What are the check-in and check-out times?
questions.answer: Check-in starts from 3:00 PM, and check-out must be done before 11:00 AM. If you need early check-in or late check-out, please contact us in advance to check availability.

questions.question: What amenities are included in the rooms?
questions.answer: Our rooms are equipped with free Wi-Fi, air conditioning, cable TV, minibar, safe, private bathroom with toiletries, and daily housekeeping.

questions.question: Do the rooms have a balcony or sea view?
questions.answer: Some of our rooms have balconies and panoramic sea views. You can select this option when booking or check availability with our team.

questions.question: Are pets allowed in the rooms?
questions.answer: We accept pets in specific rooms for an additional charge. We recommend contacting the hotel before your arrival to know the conditions and availability.

questions.question: Is breakfast included in the rooms?
questions.answer: Yes, breakfast is included in most of our rates. We offer a varied buffet breakfast with sweet and savory options, as well as gluten-free and vegetarian alternatives.

questions.question: Do the rooms have a kitchen or microwave?
questions.answer: Some suites and apartments include a kitchenette with microwave, fridge, and kitchen utensils. If you need this amenity, please indicate it when booking.

questions.question: Can extra beds or cribs be added to the room?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer extra beds and cribs for children upon request and subject to availability. Additional charges may apply depending on the rate booked.

reviews.text: The best spa experience I have ever had. The staff is incredibly attentive and the facilities are top notch. I will be back soon!
reviews.author: Maria

reviews.text: I have never felt so good as when I left the spa! A unique experience.
reviews.author: John
